message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, I understand its worth to you might be around $800,000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a fair offer of $950,000. This price not only reflects the product's value but also provides you with substantial savings compared to its market valuation. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this purchase. Should you have any questions or need further details, please don't hesitate to reach out.
